Package resource

Contains all the components required to manage worker processes (resource). Each worker is a separate process spawned from the master process. The components of this package must deal with all the infrastructure management aspects of the application which involve spawning, killing and maintaining workers, generating heartbeats for them heartbeat and managing changes on account of failure to nodes. IResourceManager is the primary interface for this package.

This component does not manage tasks allocated to workers, nor does it allocates tasks. For task allocation, check taskallocation.

Author:
somilgupta
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IResourceManager
    Interface for component managing worker processes (resource).
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ResourceManager
    Implementation of IResourceManager.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    CapacityFullException
    Exception thrown when more workers are created than the assigned capacity to the resource manager.
    WorkerInstantiationException
    Exception thrown when there is failure in creating worker process.
